channel.title: How To Integrate Hupspot Data With Redash?
channel.description: is there an ability to read hupspot data in redash ?

item.title: How To Integrate Hupspot Data With Redash?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
There isn’t a dedicated query runner for hubspot. However if Hubspot has an API you may be able to use the JSON data source to fetch data from it.

Alternatively, Redash makes it straightforward to add a new query runner. If someone in the community is interested to contribute one we’re happy to answer questions here on the forum and get it merged ASAP.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Integrate Hupspot Data With Redash?
